attributes.action: Increase in tax funds towards information about gangs
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition is to get more money put in to education about gangs. This would help the youths of today see all the negatives aspects of gangs and would make them less inclined to join a gang. This would not only make our streets safer, but give young people more of an opportunity in life.
We would like to see an increase in government funding towards education about gangs.
